content: 2006 Hong Kong-Singaporean film ***Love Story*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 爱情故事) is a 2006 Hong Kong and Singaporean [romantic drama film](/wiki/Romantic_drama_film) directed by [Kelvin Tong](/wiki/Kelvin_Tong). The film follows a romance novelist and his four different muses, and stars Allen Lin, Erica Lee, [Evelyn Tan](/wiki/Evelyn_Tan), Tracy Tan and Amanda Ling. Funded by [Andy Lau](/wiki/Andy_Lau)'s production company Focus Films as part of its *Focus: First Cuts* projects which was set up to encourage the region's promising directors, the film won Tong the Best Director award at the 2006 [Singapore International Film Festival](/wiki/Singapore_International_Film_Festival). ## Cast - Allen Lin as Jiang Qin - Erica Lee as PC 136 - [Evelyn Tan](/wiki/Evelyn_Tan) as Librarian - Tracy Tan as Theatre usher - Amanda Ling as Punk rocker - [Benjamin Heng](/wiki/Benjamin_Heng) as The actor - Ben Yeung ## Awards and nominations YearAwardsCategoryRecipientResultRef.2006[Singapore International Film Festival](/wiki/Singapore_International_Film_Festival)[Silver Screen Award for Best Director](/wiki/List_of_Singapore_International_Film_Festival_awards)[Kelvin Tong](/wiki/Kelvin_Tong)Won2006[Locarno Film Festival](/wiki/Locarno_Film_Festival)[Golden Leopard – Filmmakers of the Present](/wiki/Golden_Leopard_%E2%80%93_Filmmakers_of_the_Present)[Kelvin Tong](/wiki/Kelvin_Tong)Nominated - *Love Story* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub.
